Package org.smooks.util

Smooks Utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassUtil
    Utility methods to aid in class/resource loading.
    CollectionsUtil
    Collections Utilities.
    DollarBraceDecoder
    Decoder for Strings containing "${xxxxx}" type patterns.
    FreeMarkerTemplate
    FreeMarker template.
    FreeMarkerUtils
    FreeMarker utility class.
    HsqlServer  
    IteratorEnumeration
    Iterator to Enumeration Adapter.
    JNDIUtil
    JNDI utilities.
    MultiLineToStringBuilder
    Static utility class for generating JSON like multi line Strings from Maps, List, Arrays and the ExecutionContext.
    MVELTemplate
    MVEL template.
    StdoutToLog4jFilter
    StoutToLog4jFilter is just a simple FileWriter implementation that supresses output unless the log4j priority is set to debug.
